item.description:
Join us for a dinner at Venezia.  This restaurant was the top-voted restaurant members want to dine at in our 2009 non-A-Z Member-Suggested Restaurants in January's Poll. The view is perfect - looking out to the Boston sky line. It really is a breath taking view of the city.  The price range of the menu is as low as $15.00 to $25.00.  This is an Italian restaurant, however, the food truly is delicious as both Alison and Jeanne can attest to as they have both dined here in the past.  You can go on the Venezia website and check out the menu price range. 

 

We hope you can join Alison and Jeanne for dinner at Venezia.  You will not be disappointed the food and the view is worth attending. 

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Venezia Restaurant Dinner

Thursday March 8, 2012 @ 6:30pm

Venezia Restaurant

20 Ericsson Street

Dorchester, MA 02122

(617) 436-3120

www.venezia-onthewater.com

 

Meeting Place: Please meet outside the front door (inside if it is raining or snowing of course). We may have to wait a few minutes to be seated.

 

Event Organizers/Hosts: Alison and Jeanne

Min/Max: No minimum. Alison and Jeanne will dine by themselves if need be.[:)] Due to the size of the restaurant, the max is set at 10 people.

Guests: None, this is a Members-Only event due to seating capacity.

Event Fees: Current 2012 Annual Members - FREE; Members - $2; $12 to become a 2012 Annual Member

RSVP Deadline: 8pm on Wednesday, March 7th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.  This has been the SSDOMG's policy for over 5 years now and it helps avoid confusion when paying the bill.

Inclement Weather:  This event takes place rain, snow or shine.  In the case of an extreme weather forecast we will update this information at least 24 hours prior to the event.

Please see the Pages for more information about the SSDOMG's policies and procedures which help ensure a smoother, relaxed, fun dining experience for everyone.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

From points North

Take 93 North to Exit 11 (Granite Ave/Ashmont) right at second set of lights onto Gallivan Blvd.   Follow for ½ mile to Neponset Circle at Neponset Circle follow signs to 93 North, Just before on ramp take a sharp right onto Redfield Street and follow Venezia signs on left.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the front door or at our table after we are seated.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Venezia Restaurant Dinner
